project_plan.name: Basic Data Analysis on CSV File
project_plan.description: Implement a Python program that performs basic data analysis on a CSV file. The program will calculate and display the mean, median, and mode for numerical columns specified by the user.

task.name: Implement data loading from a CSV file
Implement function to calculate mean for specified numerical columns
Implement function to calculate median for specified numerical columns
Implement function to calculate mode for specified numerical columns
Write tests for data loading, mean, median, and mode functions
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
